column1: I like this app ,it's really clear and simple
I do appreciate having this Weather Live app to keep me uptodate with the activity of the weather
Nice apps and l wish the typhoon forecast is free thank you. God bless admin💝
This is totally change my life
Quite accurate enough! Help decides wether to bring umbrella outside ❤️❗
Everything I needed is in the app
Tap on ANYTHING and you get an ad. This is insane. Uninstalling. I was never able to move off the opening page. Useless. ITS THE WEATHER!!!!
I really like the app it's ok an cool 👍👊😎
WAY too many ads, just installed it and spent the first 5 minutes waiting for ads to clear every time I looked at something on the app. Skip video does not work. No thanks
First 3 minutes of using there were 5 ads
I have placed it above my other weather apps 👍
Wow!!! It's been too helpful but I would like the graphics to improve with lively image
This is a really good app for your phone it has everything I love it
Thank you for weather App and weather info.
So far I 'am very impressed 👍. Keep up the great work. 🌟
Nice Weather Forecast Application Easy To Use Accurate Temperature Awesome
this is far better than Google weatherv
It is an accurate and reliable app
